data.name: DREAMLANDER
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to a world of dreams and nightmares!



What can you do in DREAMLANDER?

  • Explore multiple worlds / realities filled with memorable characters, multiple art-styles, enemies you'll love to hate, secrets galore, and much more!



  • Enjoy character back-stories, a deep world lore, and make choices to decide how your story will end.

  • Meet several characters, and make friends & enemies across the land.



  • Make tough decisions that may decide the fate of yourself and others.

  • Help restore order to a cursed land.

  • Battle enemies in a variety of different game modes. When you enter a battle, the gameplay will switch to 1 of multiple retro-style game genres.
    Ex: Some battles will be shoot em' ups, while others will be platforming based, (maybe a pinball game), etc.

  • Enjoy an OST.

Note from the creator:
I really hope you enjoy DREAMLANDER. This is, essentially, my retro / indie game inspired labor of love. I've sunk about 5 years of my life into this game already, and expect it to take another year or so to reach completion. (Sorry for the wait!) I'll be releasing regular updates on how it's coming along until it releases.

Thanks for checking out my game.
Brad Donohoo

data.short_description: Welcome to a world of dreams and nightmares! Go on a unique adventure and restore peace to a cursed dream-like world. Explore the lands and make friends & foes in this highly experimental RPG.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i-5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
